data.meanings: change its manner/state, turn it away/back, change/pervert opinion/judgement, deceive, lie/falsehood/untruth, overturn.
data.sentence: The word وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ comes from the root ا ف ك and is associated with the meanings: change its manner/state, turn it away/back, change/pervert opinion/judgement, deceive, lie/falsehood/untruth, overturn.

data.meanings: to fall steep as a bird to its prey, rev, perish, pull down, destroy, disappear, yearn, fancy, beguile, infatuate, be blown, inspire with low passion.
data.sentence: The word أَهْوَى comes from the root ه و ي and is associated with the meanings: to fall steep as a bird to its prey, rev, perish, pull down, destroy, disappear, yearn, fancy, beguile, infatuate, be blown, inspire with low passion.
